features: Humane Oil-Free Daily Lightweight Face Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin - 4 Fl OZ - Gentle for All Skin Types - With Hyaluronic Acid and Soothing Antioxidants Like Aloe Vera, Cucumber Extract and Grape Seed Extract

Humane Oil-Free Moisturizer: Gentle and non-irritating, this oil-free face moisturizer teams moisture-locking hyaluronic acid (which can absorb up to 1,000 times its weight in water) with soothing aloe vera and antioxidant-rich cucumber and grape seed extracts. Suitable for all skin types, but particularly oily or acne-prone complexions. Dermatologist-tested. 4 FL. OZ. bottle

Hydrates & Soothes Skin: Contains a blend of effective, skin-friendly ingredients, including hyaluronic acid to stave off moisture loss, aloe vera to combat acne and inflammation, and cucumber extract to balance oil production and soothe irritation while supporting skin's natural barrier. Plus grape seed extract, one of the most powerful antioxidants to promote healing and collagen synthesis while protecting against environmental assault.

Lightweight, Fast-Absorbing and Non-Greasy: Lightweight formula layers under makeup easily, absorbing quickly and leaving skin with a smooth, nongreasy finish. Apply daily to calm redness and irritation, strengthen skin's natural barrier and fend off free radicals.

Simple, Clean, Safe & Effective: Our products don’t chase trends. Instead, we harness the healing powers of potent ingredients to get you real results with clean, vegan and cruelty-free ingredients. You won't find parabens, phthalates, sulfates (SLS and SLES), alcohol, paraffin, formaldehyde, mineral oil, synthetic fragrance/color, petrolatum, DEA, triclosan, GMOs or animal byproducts in our formulations. A proud member of PETA’s Beauty Without Bunnies program. Made in the USA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I have been using a very expensive moisturizer for a few years. When I went to order it, they had changed the product and upped the price, which spurred me to find this brand. My skin is combination, and in some places very oily. I can NOT use anything with fragrance or oil, or it will break me out- every time. This is one of the reasons it has been so hard for me to part with my previous brand. BUT, this moisturizer is amazing! It is light weight, so it doesn't overload my oily areas, and I can use more in the drier areas. It has helped my skin tone and texture and I have noticed even less small underlying bumps on my face. It works perfectly for my sensitive skin, and I am so happy to have found it here on Amazon. Will be buying more... Keep making this PLEASE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is just a great light weight moisturizer!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this after using The Humane cleanser with Benzoyl Peroxide and loving the results. It is not greasy feeling, absorbs quickly into my 59 year old skin, and gives me just the moisture I need! This is a great brand that I had never tried before until a few months ago after having some covid mask acne issues. It literally saved my skin, clearing up acne and preventing new outbreaks. IT'S A LIFESAVER!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works if used frequently like it says
reviews.reviewText: When first applied it does look oily and heavy weight but if you give it a second then rub in a second time it goes away

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great oil-free moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: It's hard to find a clean, non-toxic moisturizer that is non-comedogenic and non-acnegenic. This moisturizer is it. Clean, scent-free, effective, doesn't clog pores or worsen acne, light feel, and, unlike some other moisturizers, it doesn't leave my skin feeling greasy later. I sometimes mix in some hyaluronic acid for extra moisture as I have dry skin, but it's great by itself, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars From a man who never moisturizes
reviews.reviewText: I have never moisturized a day in my life, but my girlfriend over the years has told me how important it is and eventually I gave in.I told her that I have very oily skin, and it usually breaks out if anything too perfume like is used.I got the free sample with my Humane Acne Face Wash (amazing by the way), and decided to give it a dryPros:SILKY feeling, not oily at all.Absorbs quickly to dry skinLasting moisturized feelingCons:A little expensive, but 1/2 - 1 pump is good every night before bed.Try it. Trust me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not very moisturizing
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used this for about a month and haven’t found it to be very moisturizing. I have really dry skin so it might be too lightweight for me. It would probably be good for someone with normal skin or in the summer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I found The One!
reviews.reviewText: I had no expectations when buying this since finding a good moisturizer for my finicky, combo skin and have been pleasantly surprised! My only hope for this had been for it to be decent enough to make it to the next moisturizer I would try, in search of a great one.I need face moisturizer to not feel too thick during the summer (now) but not be so light it doesn't do anything. I need it to not cause my skin to break out OR react allergically. I prefer to not feel it on my face a while after applying it, as some do.Scents are tricky -- I don't mind a light scent, but many are too strong, or turn out to be a scent I don't love (and when you're putting it on your face you need to love it). Also, some unscented stuff actually has a smell, which I do NOT love.NOT ONLY does this moisturizer fit all those criteria, but I noticed my skin actually looks better than ever! AND there truly is no scent, good or bad!!Tip: I don't use a full pump of the moisturizer on my face, since that does lead to it not fully absorbing, and leaving that tacky, still-there feeling. I consider this a bonus, though, since it means a bottle will go farther!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After reading the ingredients again we decided it was to harsh on skin.
